name: Lenovo - 21.5' All-In-One - AMD A4-Series - 4GB Memory - 500GB Hard Drive - Black
description: Experience efficiency with this Lenovo C40 - F0B5000GUS 21.5' all-in-one computer, which features built-in wireless networking and 4GB DDR3L SDRAM. The 21.5' high-definition display delivers sharp visuals.
